name: nativescript-bluetooth
description: Connect to and interact with Bluetooth LE peripherals

scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run tsc && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-bluetooth && tns plugin add ../plugin
scripts.clean: rimraf plugin/ios plugin/android plugin/**/*.d.ts plugin/**/*.js plugin/**/*.js.map plugin/node_modules plugin/package-lock.json
